title: Google Pixel XL keeps restarting ( Android 10 OS)
content:
I own a Google Pixel XL and a couple of days ago I upgraded to Android 10 OS, unknowingly that it would lead to this problem. Today at one point the screen frooze and after a couple of minutes it started to reboot endlessly. 
When I try to enter the Android Boost and select recovery mode, it doesn't take me to the Android lying down with chest opened icon to select Wipe Data/Factory Reset ; instead the Google icon appears again and the phone retakes the looping process of loading and then restart.

Can you please troubleshoot this issue for me?
